name: AdverseReactionRisk
title: Adverse Reaction Risk
description:
Risk of harmful or undesirable physiological response which is unique to the individual and associated with exposure to a known substance.

Includes, but not limited to, allergy and intolerance​

Scope:​
- Medication​
- Food​
- Environmental, including latex and bites/stings

element.definition:
Risk of harmful or undesirable physiological response which is unique to the individual and associated with exposure to a known substance.

Includes, but not limited to, allergy and intolerance​

Scope:​
- Medication​
- Food​
- Environmental, including latex and bites/stings

Identification of a substance, or substance class, which is considered to put the individual at risk of an adverse reaction event. Both an individual substance and a substance class are valid entries in Substance. A substance may be a compound of simpler substances, for example a medicinal product.
Clinical symptom and/or sign that were observed or associated with the adverse reaction.
Additional narrative about the adverse reaction risk not captured in other fields.
